title: Remove Infernal Dragons
body: Do we really need this dmg increase? I think dmg is already too high.

replies.body: And replace it with?

> [{quoted}](name=ChaoticEkko,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vJIcvbsc,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-06-24T20:09:20.669+0000)
>
> And replace it with?

damage reduction dragon

damage reduction dragon is even worse

it means the team that's ahead in dragons becomes harder to kill making it even harder to stage a comeback.

let me put a scenario to show you why:

zed is fed and his team took a dragon

your support manages to outplay him and stun him.

because he had infernal drake, he dies during the stun. the infernal drake did nothing to help him not die.

because he had dmg reduction drake, he doesn't die during the stun. he then escapes/kills the rest of your team cause he's fed.

Rofl!
You got me there ;D

The big problem with infernal is that dealing more damage in teamfights is ALWAYS useful. Moving faster, more out-of-combat regen when low, and more damage to objectives are all more situational than more damage.

SHH! If you say that they'll double the spawn rate...

"We feel dragons weren't being contested enough, and there wasn't enough play around the bot lane. With this change (Double infernal spawn rates), we hope to increase the 5 man bot plays that you all love and at the same time, increase the damage which seems to have been creeping a bit on the low side."

While damage is too high, removing infernal isnt the way to fix it.  Damage should simply be lower across the board, and infernal should be a reason to try and fight the opponent team to keep them from increasing their damage, so that you can get the buff yourself.
